thread.title: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville Welcomes Fans to Superior RoughRiders Series this October
thread.title_full: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville Welcomes Fans to Superior RoughRiders Series this October

author: Maggie Mistovich
title: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville Welcomes Fans to Superior RoughRiders Series this October
text:
Beginning Friday, October 23rd, throughout the weekend, the Superior RoughRiders will be taking on the Las Vegas Storm in an ice hockey series sure to be thrilling. The three games will be held at Boulder Valley Ice, Superior RoughRiders home rink. Both teams are fierce competitors in the Western States Hockey League. Monday might be football night in America, but the weekends are for Western States Hockey League, don’t miss the chance to watch these great teams face off. Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville welcomes all fans to stay the weekend in Boulder and enjoy all three games, as well as everything else Boulder has to offer. Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville offers guests great amenities, cozy atmosphere and comfortable guest rooms, all within minutes of downtown Boulder. Guest amenities include free hot breakfast daily, complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, indoor pool, fitness center and comfortable guest rooms, making guests feel right at home. With various room types including queen and king rooms, king suites and accessible rooms, available upon request, Hampton Inn offers guests comfortable accommodations at an affordable price.
For reservations and more information on the Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville, please visit http://www.louisvillehampton.com or call (303) 666-7700. The Hampton Inn by Hilton Boulder Louisville is proudly managed by Stonebridge Companies in Denver, Colo.
Founded in 1991 by Navin C. Dimond, Stonebridge Companies is a privately owned, innovative hotel owner, operator and developer headquartered near Denver. The diverse listing of properties includes select-service, extended-stay, mid-scale and full-service hotels in markets throughout the U.S. For detailed information, visit http://www.sbcos.com .
